review_title: Great company, Very nice work enviornment
pros: Staff, Job satisfaction, Opportunities, Creativity, Mission
cons: Salary, Salary, Salary, Office Building, Benefits

review_title: Volunteering at Camara is a great, but interns must hold management to their promises.
pros: Great team of people. Ambitious projects and lots of scope to learn new skills.
cons: Some interns might be landed in a job that demands more than they are experienced to handle. These positions should be paid ones for experienced people.

review_title: Great organisation if you want to make a social impact
pros:
Great social mission
Great people to work with
Flexible working
cons: No additional benefits that are the norm in 'For Profit' sector
